heading: These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994
text_raw:
1. 

(1) 

These Regulations may be cited as the Health Insurance Act 1994 

(Section 11E(3)) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 20th day of December

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 2. The Schedule attached to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3))
text_raw:
2. The Schedule attached to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3)) 
Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 92 of 2013) is amended by the deletion of “22” in 
column (1), “Aviva Health Insurance Ireland Ltd” in column (2), “Level 1 
Hospital” in column (3) and “31 March 2013” in column (4) of the Schedule. 

Amendment of Schedule to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3)) (No. 
4) Regulations 2013
text_norm: 2 schedule attached health insurance act 1994 (section11e(3)) regulation 2013 (s.i no 92 2013) amended deletion 22 column (1) aviva health insurance ireland ltd column (2) level 1 hospital column (3) 31 march 2013 column (4) schedule amendment schedule health insurance act 1994 (section11e(3)) (no 4) regulation 2013

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: 3. The Schedule attached to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3))
text_raw:
3. The Schedule attached to the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3)) 

(No. 4) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 567 of 2013) is amended— 

(a) by the deletion of “22” in column (1), “Aviva Health Insurance 
Ireland Ltd in column (2), “Level 1 Hospital” in column (3) and 
“1 January 2014” in column (4) of the Schedule, 

and 

(b) by the deletion of “338” in column (1), “Aviva Health Insurance 
Ireland Ltd” in column (2), “Value Focus” in column (3) and “1 
January 2014” in column (4) of the Schedule. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [690] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of The Health Insurance Authority, 
10 December 2024. 

PATRICIA BYRON, 

Chairperson/ Member. 

SÍLE HANLEY 

Authorised Officer. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [690]

title: Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012) (No. 45 of 2012) and section 8 of the Health
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made by The Health Insurance Authority pursuant to 
Section 11E(3) of the Health Insurance Act 1994, as inserted by section 15 of 
the Health Insurance (Amendment) Act 2012 and Section 8 of the Health 
Insurance (Amendment) Act 2013. These regulations amend by deletion relevant 
contracts specified under this enactment, in the Schedules to the Health 
Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3)) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 92 of 2013) and 
the Health Insurance Act 1994 (Section11E(3)) (No. 4) Regulations 2013 (S.I. 
No. 567 of 2013). 

 
 
 
 
 
 [690] 5
